Info.Title: August Rush
Info.Writer: Nick Castle (screenplay), James V. Hart (screenplay), Paul Castro (story), Nick Castle (story)
Info.Actors: Freddie Highmore, Keri Russell, Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Terrence Howard
Info.Plot: An orphaned musical prodigy uses his gift to try to find his birth parents.
Info.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 10 nominations.
